data.name: Phobias: Memories of the Past
data.detailed_description:
About the Game:

Phobias: Memories of the Past is a 3D horror game about Phobias.
The Protagonist is in a coma and is living her nightmares that occurred in the past. Each level represents a different phobia and a memory of the protagonist that happened in the past.

Mechanics:

Controlling the Character with the WASD keys on your keyboard and using the Mouse to move the camera you must escape the place while there are enemies behind you, with each level that passes a new mechanic such as: A weapon to shoot enemies, flashlights with batteries, places to hide and more!
data.about_the_game:
About the Game:

The Protagonist is in a coma and is living her nightmares that occurred in the past. Each level represents a different phobia and a memory of the protagonist that happened in the past.

data.short_description: Phobias: Memories of the Past a horror game focused on Phobias, you are a man living your nightmares of past memories, are you ready to play? But tell me, what is your phobia? You are in a place where you have to go through the doors to save yourself from death, you are not alone...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 7020U 2.30GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 9400F 2.9Ghz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
